title: Correction to: Polyploid plants take cytonuclear perturbations in stride
content: This is a correction to: Daniel B Sloan, Justin L Conover, Corrinne E Grover, Jonathan F Wendel, Joel Sharbrough, Polyploid plants take cytonuclear perturbations in stride, The Plant Cell, 2024, koae021, https://doi.org/10.1093/plcell/koae021
